system.availability: Dome-Shaped Tents formed of polycarbonate sides and plasteel rods. Difficult to transport but incredibly durable. Designs are modular and can be linked into larger structures. Usually has a camoflauged exterior. By Default, Primitive AP 8 but can be upgraded to Primitive AP 12 for extra cost. Comes in 3 Person and 6 Person variants.
system.cost:
3 Person Tent: 5kg, Common, 60 Thrones Cost | 6 Person Tent: 10kg, Scarce, 100 Thrones.
Beetle Tent Armour Upgrade: +8kg, Rare, 80 Thrones,
